alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 3:24PM CDT until further notice by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LA SALLE COUNTY... At 324 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mendota, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 320 PM, ping pong size hail was reported in La Moille. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Mendota, Troy Grove, Prairie Center and Triumph. This includes... Tri-County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstate... I-39 between mile markers 63 and 77. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
